page.title: 16ATTITUDES
page.content: Village people tend to wait for the newcomers to introduce themselves.In Hathern village in particular the "old" villagers tend to keep themselves apart from the newcomers_ more or less implying the village belongs to them and they are intruders.Nevertheless they can be charmed round when they are more sure of the "intruders". Once a friendship has been established this will probably be a lifelong thing. Newcomers to the villages complain they find it difficult to make friends because people keep themselves to themselves until they know you.The easiest way to meet people is to meet other parents collecting children from school.
